item.description:
Meet in front of Black Bear.

It starts at 1pm, get there early(11am) to find parking, and BYOB!!!!!! All the bars will be open after but if you want to drink during the parade (which everyone is doing) bring your own.



Its 1pm in New Haven. Get there early to find parking (may have a walk),and get ready to party. It is similiar to UCONNS springweekend.... A crazy drunkin-fest. Expect high octane....





The details are still to be determined I'm just posting this on here for now to get a head count. So RSVP!! Time to come out guys I apologize for the long delay been busy with things.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in front of Black Bear. Give me a call 860-919-9782!
item.name: ST. Patrick's Day Parade in New Haven
